summary:
Ninneko - December Big Update - Burning 2.0 Mechanism

Converting Neko Boxes

Burning Event

MASTER CHEF

NEW MONTH - NEW JOURNEY

 Ninja cat game - Ninneko is the leading edge of NFT game that combines Idle RPG gameplay and
Breeding system.

 Play to earn - Summon, breed and trade Ninnekos on Marketplace

Stake NFT Ninnekos and NINO to earn & redeem in-game rewards

Trade game items with other players

 Gameplay - IDLE system

Gain incremental rewards and automatically train your Ninneko over time
without grinding.

Genetic system

Two Ninnekos can be combined to generate new breeds based on their parents'
genes.

Rich Gameplay

Progress through the campaign and fight the enemies from destroying your
village. Race to the finish in Ninja's Tower...

Strategic Battle

It's not easy to assemble an ideal team, given a large amount of Ninnekos,
skills, and play styles available in the game.

Trading

You own your Ninnekos and free to trade them outside of the game

Season and Events

A variety of events are held constantly that we are promising to give our
fellow players valuable rewards.

 Road Map - Q4, 2021

Testing NFT Ninnekos and Market Place
Issuing NINO Token & IDO
Alpha Test on BSC TestNet

Q1, 2022

Official Lauch

Q2, 2022

Guild War
Free to play extended features

Q3, 2022

NFT Land
Village Building
NFT Burn

Q4, 2022

Update Level
NFT Land Application
